title: Why is the League matchmaking client smarter than the gameplay client?
body:
In launcher:
Turn on your WiFi and unplug your ethernet cable - connection lost for 5 seconds before the application reconnects.
In game:
Turn on your WiFi, unplug cable - connection lost until you close the entire application and relaunch it.

Why isn't the game client smart enough to switch connections when the launcher is?

Just trying to troubleshoot some lag.
